Room.Name: Gold Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down a very ornate looking hallway composed mostly of gold.
Room.LongDescription: The strange golden hallway continues to the west and ends in a odd looking door to the east. The door to the east is not locked. Looking through the keyhole, you can see a larger, gold room, to which this hallway must be connected. The hallway is sparkling and clean without a speck of dust to see seen.
